header

Class ESAHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • header.ESA
      • header.ESAChannel
        • header.ESAHeader

  • public class ESAHeader
extends ESAChannel
    Records signal attributes of all channels, one by one, contained in an EDF file

      • ESAHeader

        public ESAHeader(java.io.RandomAccessFile raf,
                 java.io.File edfFile,
                 int nChannels,
                 boolean istemplate)
        Constructs an ESAheader from a file (in form of RandomAccessFile).
        Parameters:
        raf - Random file accessor
        edfFile - host EDF file of the header
        nChannels - the number of Channels
        istemplate - true if this header is template

      • ESAHeader

        public ESAHeader(javax.swing.JTable table,
                 boolean template)
        Constructs an ESA header from an ESA table
        Parameters:
        table - ESA table used to extract ESA header
        template - true if this ESA header is template

        Parameters:
        nChannels - the number of channels of an EDF file

    • Method Detail

      • saveToDisk

        public void saveToDisk(java.io.RandomAccessFile raf,
                       java.io.File file,
                       boolean alreadyHasEIAHeader,
                       boolean template)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Saves ESA header part to disk
        Parameters:
        raf - random file accessor
        file - the file to store the header. the file must conform to raf
        alreadyHasEIAHeader - true for EDF file, false for ESA template header
        template - true if this header is a template
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException
